entries.title: Financial Statistics Report (H1 2025)
entries.text: Broad money rose by 8.3 percent. At end-June, broad money supply (M2) stood at RMB330.29 trillion, rising by 8.3 percent year on year.

entries.title: Financial Statistics Report (February 2025)
entries.text: Broad money rose by 7 percent. At end-February, broad money supply (M2) stood at RMB320.52 trillion, rising by 7 percent year on year.

entries.title: Financial Statistics Report (May 2025)
entries.text: Broad money rose by 7.9 percent. At end-May, broad money supply (M2) stood at RMB325.78 trillion, rising by 7.9 percent year on year.
